feed.title: Google Cloud: Bare Metal Solution
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Bare Metal Solution

entry.content: Support for OS image SLES12SP5SAP on Bare Metal Solution is now deprecated. For information, see Available OS images.
entry.summary: Support for the SLES12SP5SAP OS image on Bare Metal Solution has been deprecated. Please refer to the documentation for available OS images.
entry.title: Deprecated: SLES12SP5SAP Deprecated on Bare Metal Solution
